Container.Name: breaker-panel-helper
Container.Overview:
Breaker Panel Helper is a comprehensive electrical panel management application that allows you to: - Track and manage electrical breakers across multiple panels - Support for single, double-pole, and tandem breakers - Circuit management with room assignments and detailed notes - Critical breaker planning and move operations - French/English localization - Visual panel layout with drag-and-drop room management - Export and print functionality
Perfect for electricians, homeowners, and facilities managers.
